%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmstrack_tmp
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
     lms_track_loadparenetloadid

    ,CASE 
        WHEN sum(lms_sroute_localflag) is null THEN 'Linehaul'
        WHEN sum(lms_sroute_localflag) = 0 THEN 'Outlying'
        WHEN sum(lms_sroute_localflag)/count(lms_sroute_localflag) = 1 THEN 'Local'
        WHEN sum(lms_sroute_localflag)/count(lms_sroute_localflag) = 2 THEN 'Cross Border'
        ELSE 'Mixed'   
    END as lms_loadchild_type


FROM stlmstrack tr 
LEFT JOIN stwaybill w on w.lms_waybill_id = tr.lms_track_waybillid
LEFT JOIN stdeliverypickupcustomer c on c.lms_customer_id = w.lms_waybill_delivercustid
LEFT JOIN stsroute s on s.lms_sroute_id = c.lms_customer_srouteid

GROUP BY lms_track_loadparenetloadid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stloadparent_tmp
AS
SELECT 
    lc.lms_loadchild_parentloadid
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_vehicleid
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_ldate
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_vehodo
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_vehodo2
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_fromlocid
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_tolocid
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_ttypeid
    ,CASE 
        WHEN lc2.lms_loadchild_ttypeid = 17 THEN 'Collect'
        ELSE COALESCE(tr.lms_loadchild_type,'Unknown')
    END as lms_loadchild_type
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrweight) as lms_loadchild_aggrweight
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrchargeweight) as lms_loadchild_aggrchargeweight
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrvolweight) as lms_loadchild_aggrvolweight
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrvolumiserweight) as lms_loadchild_aggrvolumiserweight
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrmaxweight) as lms_loadchild_aggrmaxweight
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrnoparcels) as lms_loadchild_aggrnoparcels
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrweightexclspecdel) as lms_loadchild_aggrweightexclspecdel
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrchargeweightexclspecdel) as lms_loadchild_aggrchargeweightexclspecdel
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrvolweightexclspecdel) as lms_loadchild_aggrvolweightexclspecdel
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrvolumiserweightexclspecdel) as lms_loadchild_aggrvolumiserweightexclspecdel
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrmaxweightexclspecdel) as lms_loadchild_aggrmaxweightexclspecdel
    ,sum(lc.lms_loadchild_aggrnoparcelsexclspecdel) as lms_loadchild_aggrnoparcelsexclspecdel
FROM stloadchild lc 
LEFT JOIN stloadchild lc2 on lc2.lms_loadchild_parentloadid = lc.lms_loadchild_parentloadid and lc2.rn = 1
LEFT JOIN stlmstrack_tmp tr on tr.lms_track_loadparenetloadid = lc.lms_loadchild_parentloadid
WHERE lc.lms_loadchild_parentloadid is not null
GROUP BY 
    lc.lms_loadchild_parentloadid
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_vehicleid
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_ldate
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_vehodo
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_vehodo2
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_fromlocid
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_tolocid
    ,tr.lms_loadchild_type
    ,lc2.lms_loadchild_ttypeid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stloadparent
AS
SELECT
    t.lms_loadchild_parentloadid as  lms_loadparent_parentloadid 
    ,t.lms_loadchild_vehicleid as lms_loadparent_vehicleid
    ,t.lms_loadchild_ldate as lms_loadparent_ldate
    ,t.lms_loadchild_vehodo as  lms_loadparent_vehodo 
    ,t.lms_loadchild_vehodo2 as  lms_loadparent_vehodo2 
    ,t.lms_loadchild_fromlocid as  lms_loadparent_fromlocid 
    ,t.lms_loadchild_tolocid as  lms_loadparent_tolocid 
    ,t.lms_loadchild_ttypeid as lms_loadparent_ttypeid
    ,t.lms_loadchild_type as  lms_loadparent_type 
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrweight  as  lms_loadparent_aggrweight 
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrchargeweight  as  lms_loadparent_aggrchargeweight
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrvolweight  as  lms_loadparent_aggrvolweight
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrvolumiserweight  as  lms_loadparent_aggrvolumiserweight
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrmaxweight  as  lms_loadparent_aggrmaxweight
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrnoparcels  as  lms_loadparent_aggrnoparcels
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrweightexclspecdel  as  lms_loadparent_aggrweightexclspecdel
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrchargeweightexclspecdel  as  lms_loadparent_aggrchargeweightexclspecdel
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrvolweightexclspecdel  as  lms_loadparent_aggrvolweightexclspecdel
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrvolumiserweightexclspecdel  as  lms_loadparent_aggrvolumiserweightexclspecdel
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrmaxweightexclspecdel  as  lms_loadparent_aggrmaxweightexclspecdel
    ,t.lms_loadchild_aggrnoparcelsexclspecdel  as  lms_loadparent_aggrnoparcelsexclspecdel
    ,v.md_vehicle_vehicletype
    ,v.md_vehicle_internalvolume
    ,d.id as orv_dispatch_id
    ,d.lmsid as orv_dispatch_lmsid
    ,d.vid as orv_dispatch_vid
    ,d.did as orv_dispatch_did
    ,d.status as orv_dispatch_status
    ,to_timestamp(d.startdate) as orv_dispatch_startdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.stopdate) as orv_dispatch_stopdate
    ,d.vehicletype as orv_dispatch_vehicletype
    ,d.uid as orv_dispatch_uid
    ,to_timestamp(d.estdepdate) as orv_dispatch_estdepdate
    ,d.trailer as orv_dispatch_trailer
    ,d.trailer2 as orv_dispatch_trailer2
    ,d.fromlocid as orv_dispatch_fromlocid
    ,d.tolocid as orv_dispatch_tolocid
    ,d.site as orv_dispatch_site
    ,to_timestamp(d.lastupdate) as orv_dispatch_lastupdate
    ,d.etastatus as orv_dispatch_etastatus
    ,d.startinglat as orv_dispatch_startinglat
    ,d.startinglng as orv_dispatch_startinglng
    ,d.endinglat as orv_dispatch_endinglat
    ,d.endinglng as orv_dispatch_endinglng
    ,d.startingfrom as orv_dispatch_startingfrom
    ,d.goingto as orv_dispatch_goingto
    ,d.importissue as orv_dispatch_importissue
    ,to_timestamp(d.insdate) as orv_dispatch_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.estarrdate) as orv_dispatch_estarrdate
    ,d.duration as orv_dispatch_duration
    ,d.distance as orv_dispatch_distance
    ,d.cost as orv_dispatch_cost
    ,d.stoplat as orv_dispatch_stoplat
    ,d.stoplng as orv_dispatch_stoplng
    ,d.stopreason as orv_dispatch_stopreason
    ,d.startodo as orv_dispatch_startodo
    ,d.stopodo as orv_dispatch_stopodo
    ,d.expduration as orv_dispatch_expduration
    ,d.expdistance as orv_dispatch_expdistance
    ,d.expcost as orv_dispatch_expcost
    ,d.collectionid as orv_dispatch_collectionid
    ,d.crew as orv_dispatch_crew
    ,d.crewnames as orv_dispatch_crewnames
    ,d.bocloseuid as orv_dispatch_bocloseuid
    ,d.routing as orv_dispatch_routing
    ,d.swapct as orv_dispatch_swapct
    ,d.debriefed as orv_dispatch_debriefed
    ,d.debriefnotes as orv_dispatch_debriefnotes
    ,d.bopin as orv_dispatch_bopin
    ,d.cpicost as orv_dispatch_cpicost
    ,d.labourcost as orv_dispatch_labourcost
    ,d.maintcost as orv_dispatch_maintcost
    ,d.inscost as orv_dispatch_inscost
    ,d.tollcost as orv_dispatch_tollcost
    ,d.fuelcost as orv_dispatch_fuelcost
    ,d.internal as orv_dispatch_internal
    ,d.childids as orv_dispatch_childids
    ,d.guid as orv_dispatch_guid
    ,d.timedefinite as orv_dispatch_timedefinite
    ,d.orvcode as orv_dispatch_orvcode
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstopdepoenter) as orv_dispatch_tsstopdepoenter
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstartdepoexit) as orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexit
    ,d.reroutect as orv_dispatch_reroutect
    ,to_timestamp(d.actualarrdate) as orv_dispatch_actualarrdate
    ,d.physicalstartlat as orv_dispatch_physicalstartlat
    ,d.physicalstartlng as orv_dispatch_physicalstartlng
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstartdepoexitapp) as orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexitapp
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstopdepoenterapp) as orv_dispatch_tsstopdepoenterapp
    ,to_timestamp(d.uncanceldate) as orv_dispatch_uncanceldate
    ,d.uncancelusername as orv_dispatch_uncancelusername
    ,d.lmsdebrifed as orv_dispatch_lmsdebrifed
    ,d.reviseddebrief as orv_dispatch_reviseddebrief
    ,d.lhtransporter as orv_dispatch_lhtransporter
    ,d.triptype as orv_dispatch_triptype
    ,d.startreason as orv_dispatch_startreason
    ,d.route as orv_dispatch_route
    ,d.tmstraileridentify as orv_dispatch_tmstraileridentify
    ,d.tmstrailer2identify as orv_dispatch_tmstrailer2identify
    ,d.tmscontroller as orv_dispatch_tmscontroller
    ,d.routekey as orv_dispatch_routekey
    ,d.courierid as orv_dispatch_courierid
    ,to_timestamp(d.originalstartdate) as orv_dispatch_originalstartdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.originalextarrival) as orv_dispatch_originalextarrival
    ,d.recomputeoriginals as orv_dispatch_recomputeoriginals
    ,d.originalextdistance as orv_dispatch_originalextdistance
    ,d.originalextduration as orv_dispatch_originalextduration
    ,to_timestamp(d.moddate) as orv_dispatch_moddate
    ,d.tmsmode as orv_dispatch_tmsmode
    ,d.driversignature as orv_dispatch_driversignature
    ,to_timestamp(x.exitdepot) as orv_dispatch_exitdepot
	,to_timestamp(x.enterdepot) as orv_dispatch_enterdepot
	,to_timestamp(x.fdeliverydate) as orv_dispatch_fdeliverydate
	,to_timestamp(x.fdeltsgeofenceenter) as orv_dispatch_fdeltsgeofenceenter
	,to_timestamp(x.fdeltsscanningstart) as orv_dispatch_fdeltsscanningstart
	,to_timestamp(x.fdeltsscanningstop) as orv_dispatch_fdeltsscanningstop
	,to_timestamp(x.fdeltspodsignature) as orv_dispatch_fdeltspodsignature
	,x.fdelnumprcls as orv_dispatch_fdelnumprcls
	,to_timestamp(x.deliverydate) as orv_dispatch_deliverydate
	,to_timestamp(x.ldeltsgeofenceenter) as orv_dispatch_ldeltsgeofenceenter
	,to_timestamp(x.ldeltsscanningstart) as orv_dispatch_ldeltsscanningstart
	,to_timestamp(x.ldeltsscanningstop) as orv_dispatch_ldeltsscanningstop
	,to_timestamp(x.ldeltspodsignature) as orv_dispatch_ldeltspodsignature
	,x.ldelnumprcls as orv_dispatch_ldelnumprcls
	,x.fromdelid as orv_dispatch_fromdelid
	,x.todelid as orv_dispatch_todelid
	,x.distancemeters as orv_dispatch_distancemeters
	,(x.durationseconds)/3600 as orv_dispatch_durationhours
	,to_timestamp(x.timeduebackatdepot) as orv_dispatch_timeduebackatdepot
	,to_timestamp(x.lastcanceleddeltodepotime) as orv_dispatch_lastcanceleddeltodepotime
    ,(d.stopdate - coalesce(x.timeduebackatdepot,x.lastcanceleddeltodepotime))/3600  orv_dispatch_difstopdatevstimedueback
    ,CASE 
        WHEN to_date(to_timestamp(d.startdate)) = to_date(to_timestamp(d.stopdate)) THEN 1
        ELSE 0
    END AS orv_dispatch_completesameday
    ,CASE
        WHEN (d.startdate + 1800) > coalesce(d.tsstartdepoexitapp,d.tsstartdepoexit) THEN 1
        ELSE 0
    END AS orv_dispatch_latedepotexitflag
    ,CASE
        WHEN (x.timeduebackatdepot + 1800) > coalesce(d.tsstopdepoenter,d.tsstopdepoenterapp) THEN 1
        ELSE 0
    END AS orv_dispatch_latedepotenterflag
    ,CASE
        WHEN coalesce(d.startdate,coalesce(d.tsstartdepoexitapp,d.tsstartdepoexit)) IS NULL THEN 1
        ELSE 0
    END AS orv_dispatch_latedepotexitflagnull
    ,CASE
        WHEN coalesce(x.timeduebackatdepot,coalesce(d.tsstopdepoenter,d.tsstopdepoenterapp)) IS NULL THEN 1
        ELSE 0
    END AS orv_dispatch_latedepotenterflagnull
    ,c.cexternal as orv_dispatch_cexternal
    ,CASE
        WHEN d.stopdate > (coalesce(d.tsstopdepoenter,d.tsstopdepoenterapp) + 900) THEN 1
        ELSE 0
    END AS orv_dispatch_latestopdateflag

FROM stloadparent_tmp t
LEFT JOIN publicdispatch d on d.lmsid = t.lms_loadchild_parentloadid and d.vehicletype = 6 and d.rn = 1
LEFT JOIN publicreportdistotmgntdispatchdt x on x.dispatchid = d.id
LEFT JOIN stmdvehicle v on v.md_vehicle_lmsid = t.lms_loadchild_vehicleid
LEFT JOIN publiccourier c on d.courierid = c.id
